CUSTOM_DEVELOPMENT_1: We help to transform organizations, their business models, user experiences, systems, infrastructure, processes and operations in order to adapt to the digital era.
WHY_WE_CREATED_INNQUBE_1: Helped by technology, society has been changing at an exponential speed for the last years, creating a new socio-economic reality that forces every industry, product or service to evolve in order not to fall into obsolescence, into digital recession.
WHY_WE_CREATED_INNQUBE_2: In this new reality where change is the only constant, in which software is increasingly protagonist (and not the only one), the capacity to attract and retain talents that fully develop their potential in our organizations will be fundamental to innovate and stay competitive. Understanding and meeting the needs and requests of an increasingly demanding and hyper-connected audience will be the key to survival.
WHY_WE_CREATED_INNQUBE_3: This disruption context represents a threat and at the same time a great opportunity for those who understand change and accompany it. Our purpose is to take advantage of our technological experience in different areas, specialties, industries and countries, to help move this path along with organizations that are willing to meet the challenge.
WHAT_WE_DO_DESC: We incentivate digital transformation, a term that can have many meanings depending on the interlocutor. For us it is defined by three main activities.
QUOTE1: La clave para ganar la carrera no es competir contra las máquinas, sino competir con máquinas.
QUOTE2: Hay un uber para cada industria, cada producto y cada servicio. Viene una revolución de innovación…
QUOTE3: No tener problemas es el problema más grande.
HOW_WE_WORK_EXPLANATION: We believe true innovation is given by working together with people, creating solutions for people. This builds a reality where digital technology benefits all. We call it “People-Based Innovation“:
LAST_MESSAGE: We are always willing to listen to people with good ideas and interesting projects. From Bariloche, Patagonia, Argentina we have the technology to work effectively with any place in the world.
